variables.label: Kutt Version
variables.description: Check out their Docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/r/kutt/kutt/tags

variables.label: Postgres Password
variables.description: Password must be at least 12 characters.  Please use a random string.

instructions.start: Kutt is a modern URL shortener with support for custom domains. Shorten URLs, manage your links and view the click rate statistics.
instructions.end:
Kutt is deployed and available as $$cap_appname-kutt . 
IMPORTANT: It will take up to 2 minutes for the application to be ready. Before that, you might see a 502 error page.

description: Kutt is a modern URL shortener with support for custom domains. Shorten URLs, manage your links and view the click rate statistics.
